snippet.title: Gunners Heart [ガンナーズハート] Game Sample - PC/Doujin
snippet.description:
Check out collectibles for popular and obscure series that you know and love at Entertainment Earth! Our affiliate links help us earn money/support the channel when you buy stuff, while keeping ads to a minimum: https://www.entertainmentearth.com/?id=BWP5WT1IOA

--------------------

Original Air Date: September 17th, 2009

Gunners Heart is a doujin game based off of SkyGunner for the PS2 and is a pretty nice-looking doujin game at that. It features new and old characters as well as new tricks that you can pull off, though the levels are mostly streamlined and linear. The game supports two players and lots of action. It was developed with Easy Game Station. 

The gameplay is mostly the same as SkyGunner. You can shoot regular fire, use special weapons and roll to evade attacks, though the latter two can cause you to overheat if you use them too often (which makes you temporarily vulnerable). You can also shop for extra weapons and a few neat extras. Enjoy.

- ADDITION -
